p: The WCB was subjected to release testing for safety and characterization assays. Safety testing included sterility (USP <71>), mycoplasma (USP <63>), endotoxin (USP <85>), and karyotyping. Characterization included flow cytometry testing for: Oct-4 >90% (10H11.2, EMD Millipore, Billerica, MA, USA; AF488 conjugated), Sox-2 >90% (Btjce, eBioscience, San Diego CA, USA; AF488 conjugated), MHC-I <10% (A4, eBioscience; APC conjugated), MHC-II <10% (CVS20, Novus Biologicals, Littleton, CO, USA; AF488 conjugated), CD105 <10% (SN6, eBioscience; PE-Cy7 conjugated), and tyrosine hydroxylase <10% (EP1532Y, Abcam, Cambridge, UK; FITC-conjugated goat anti-rabbit IgG; Abcam; polyclonal). Both MCB and WCB were stored in gas phase liquid nitrogen (LN 2).
